item.title: Denise add a quote by Brené Brown
item.description: "Vulnerability is not knowing victory or defeat, it’s understanding the necessity of both; it’s engaging. It’s being all in." -- Brené Brown

item.title: Denise add a quote by Jonathan Lear
item.description: "To be human is necessarily to be a vulnerable risk-taker; to be a courageous human is to be good at it" -- Jonathan Lear

item.title: Denise add a quote by Roman Krznaric
item.description: "What is your current work doing to you as a person – to your mind, character and relationships?" -- Roman Krznaric

item.title: Denise add a quote by Ann Patchett
item.description: "There can be something cruel about people who have had good fortune. They equate it with personal goodness." -- Ann Patchett

item.title: Denise add a quote by Ann Patchett
item.description: "The impressions we pick up as children, when our minds are still open to influence and as soft as damp sponges, are likely to stay with us the longest." -- Ann Patchett

item.title: Denise add a quote by Ann Patchett
item.description: "I think the best vacation is the one that relieves me of my own life for a while and then makes me long for it again." -- Ann Patchett

item.title: Denise add a quote by Ann Patchett
item.description: "Sometimes love does not have the most honorable beginnings, and the endings, the endings will break you in half. It’s everything in between we live for." -- Ann Patchett

item.title: Denise add a quote by John Green
item.description: "The real heroes anyway aren’t the people doing things; the real heroes are the people NOTICING things, paying attention." -- John Green
